casebody.data:
DAVID D. SEARLE, Appellant v. JOSHUA W. DAVIS, et al., Respondents. Reference—Long account—Where the matters involving the examination of a long account are pleaded both as a defence and a counterclaim, the action is referable.

*568Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Decided May 4, 1891. Appeal from an order of reference. Kellogg, Rose & Smith, attorneys and of counsel, for appellant. Daniel O'Connell, attorney and of counsel, for respondents.

The Court (per Curiam) held as stated in the headnote, and affirmed the order.
